channel.title: Numbers on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Numbers on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Quest to Find the Longest-Running Simple Computer Program
item.description: The Busy Beaver Challenge, a notoriously difficult question in theoretical computer science, is now producing answers so large they’re impossible to write out using standard mathematical notation.
